name: essence
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: essence
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the basic or most important idea or quality of something

example.eg: The essence of his argument was that education should continue throughout life.
example.egtrans: 他的观点的要旨是教育应该持续终生。

example.eg: Yet change is the very essence of life.
example.egtrans: 然而变迁恰恰是人生的本质。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: relating to the most important characteristics or ideas of something

example.eg: In essence, both sides agree on the issue.
example.egtrans: 从本质上说，双方在这个问题上的意见是一致的。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: to be the most important thing

example.eg: In any of these discussions, of course, honesty is of the essence.
example.egtrans: 当然，在探讨任何问题时都必须坦诚。

dsense.name: essence
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a strong liquid, usually from a plant or flower, that is used to add a flavour or smell to something
trans_examp.trans_cn: （通常取自植物或花的）香精，香料，精油
